title: Father

tokens.lyric: Father, you went through the nights alone,

lines.raw: [F]Father, you went through the nights alone,

tokens.lyric: opened the way to free the earth;

lines.raw: [Dm]opened the way to free the earth;

tokens.lyric: Father, together we'll walk hand in hand

lines.raw: [Bb]Father, together we'll walk hand in hand

tokens.lyric: And settle peace down on God's earth

lines.raw: [Am]And settle peace down on God's earth

tokens.lyric: It's a new dawn, I see it grow;

lines.raw: [Gm]It's a new dawn, I see it grow;

tokens.lyric: Stronger and clearer day by day.
Bringing the whole wide world into new hope.

lines.raw: [Dm]Bringing the whole wide world into new hope.

tokens.lyric: Father, wherever you go, we'll go;
Follow your tracks which lead us home.

lines.raw: [Am]Follow your tracks which lead us home.

tokens.lyric: Father, a unified world is at hand,

lines.raw: [Gm]Father, a unified world is at hand,

tokens.lyric: No one will ever stop you now.

lines.raw: [C7]No one will ever stop you now.

tokens.lyric: Father, you need us to work and fight,

lines.raw: [F]Father, you need us to work and fight,

tokens.lyric: To conquer the sins which rule the world.

lines.raw: [Dm]To conquer the sins which rule the world.

tokens.lyric: Father, we know that our time is short,

lines.raw: [Bb]Father, we know that our time is short,

tokens.lyric: And want to give our lives to you.

lines.raw: [Am]And want to give our lives to you.
